content:
Synthesis of [Cu3(L2)­(H2O)3]­·3DMF­·3Diox­·10H2O (UMCM-151-F). H3L2 (0.03 mmol, 12.0 mg) and Cu­(NO3)2­·2.5H2O (0.1 mmol, 24.0 mg) was dissolved in a solution of DMF/Diox/H2O (3 mL, V/V/V = 5:2:1) in 10 mL vial. The mixture was heated to 75 °C over 2 h and kept for 12 h. The blue crystals were collected and washed with DMF several times (yield: 86%, based on H3L2). Elemental analysis calcd (%) for UMCM-151-F: C, 45.71; N, 2.96; H, 7.30; found: C, 45.36; N, 2.89; H, 7.32. IR spectrum data (KBr, cm–1): 3369­(m), 2927­(m), 1663(s), 1545­(m), 1383(s), 1249­(m), 1178­(m), 1097(s), 870­(w), 782­(m), 729­(m), 658­(m).

Synthesis of [Cu3(L3)­(H2O)3]·3DMF·3Diox·9H2O (UMCM-151-Cl). The synthesis process of UMCM-151-F was similar to that of UMCM-151-F except with H3L3 instead of H3L2. Yield: 81% (based on H3L3). Elemental analysis calcd (%) for UMCM-151-Cl: C, 44.10; H, 7.2; N, 3.67; found: C, 43.81; H, 7.26; N, 3.59. IR Spectrum data (KBr, cm–1): 3417­(w), 1600(s), 1531(s), 1404­(m), 1320(s), 1035­(w), 781 (s), 712­(m).

Synthesis of [Cu3(L5)­(H2O)3]­·4DMF­·4Diox­·10H2O (UMCM-151-CH3 ). The synthesis process of UMCM-151-CH3 was similar to that of UMCM-151-F except with H3L5 instead of H3L2. Yield: 78% (based on H3L5). Elemental analysis calcd (%) for UMCM-151-CH3: C, 42.5; H, 7.20; N, 3.96; found: C, 41.5; H, 7.05; N, 3.88. IR Spectrum data (KBr, cm–1): 3420­(m), 3065­(m), 2954­(m), 1660(s), 1553(s), 1402(s), 1312­(m), 1254­(m), 1180­(m), 1099(s), 1019­(w), 866­(w), 790­(m), 724­(m), 665­(m),514­(m).

Synthesis of [Cu3(L2)(H2O)3]⋅3DMF⋅3Diox⋅10H2O (UMCM-151-F). H3L2 (0.03 mmol, 12.0 mg) and Cu(NO3)2⋅2.5H2O (0.1 mmol, 24.0 mg) was dissolved in a solution of DMF/Diox/H2O (3 mL, V/V/V = 5:2:1) in 10 mL vial. The mixture was heated to 75 °C over 2 h and kept for 12 h. The blue crystals were collected and washed with DMF several times (yield: 86%, based on H3L2). Elemental analysis calcd (%) for UMCM-151-F: C, 45.71; N, 2.96; H, 7.30; found: C, 45.36; N, 2.89; H, 7.32. IR spectrum data (KBr, cm-1): 3369(m), 2927(m), 1663(s), 1545(m), 1383(s), 1249(m), 1178(m), 1097(s), 870(w), 782(m), 729(m), 658(m).

Synthesis of [Cu3(L3)(H2O)3]⋅3DMF⋅3Diox⋅9H2O (UMCM-151-Cl). The synthesis process of UMCM-151-F was similar to that of UMCM-151-F except with H3L3 instead of H3L2. Yield: 81% (based on H3L3). Elemental analysis calcd (%) for UMCM-151-Cl: C, 44.10; H, 7.2; N, 3.67; found: C, 43.81; H, 7.26; N, 3.59. IR Spectrum data (KBr, cm-1): 3417(w), 1600(s), 1531(s), 1404(m), 1320(s), 1035(w), 781 (s), 712(m).

Synthesis of [Cu3(L5)(H2O)3]⋅4DMF⋅4Diox⋅10H2O (UMCM-151-CH3 ). The synthesis process of UMCM-151-CH3 was similar to that of UMCM-151-F except with H3L5 instead of H3L2. Yield: 78% (based on H3L5). Elemental analysis calcd (%) for UMCM-151-CH3: C, 42.5; H, 7.20; N, 3.96; found: C, 41.5; H, 7.05; N, 3.88. IR Spectrum data (KBr, cm-1): 3420(m), 3065(m), 2954(m), 1660(s), 1553(s), 1402(s), 1312(m), 1254(m), 1180(m), 1099(s), 1019(w), 866(w), 790(m), 724(m), 665(m),514(m).
